Articles.Content: I'm not sure if this is the correct area to ask this, but how do I change my rank on the forums. I know it's possible, I just don't remember how.
When you have one more post you'll be able to do this from your settings screen :)

Thanks!

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[quote name='sal_vager']When you have one more post you'll be able to do this from your settings screen :)[/QUOTE]

I can't exactly find [I]where[/I] I'm supposed to do this in Settings. Help me out?

[quote name='ShmikeTP']I can't exactly find [I]where[/I] I'm supposed to do this in Settings. Help me out?[/QUOTE]

Nearly everything can be accessed by going to the "private messages" page of your account. (On the left side, under the main forum buttons.) In there, you can "Edit Profile" and change the "Custom Title."

(Don't ask me why it's under "private messages" and not under the link to your account page...)

This thread references the old forum software and is no longer useful.

You can edit your profile by clicking the 'Edit profile' button on your profile page
